name: Teenage Ninja Game - Mutant Teen Adventure
name_original: Teenage Ninja Game - Mutant Teen Adventure
description:
Teenage Ninja Game - Mutant Teen Adventure is a FREE and fun adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Tap to Jump, double tap for double jump - make the teenage ninja fly!

Get as far as possible and collect coins - that will give extra points to be on the top of the leaderboard! Invite friends to play for double fun!

Help the mutant karate teen to jump with just an easy touch.

Teenage Ninja Game - Mutant Teen Adventure is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
